chain_of_thought: Nina giving a report will make Helen and Irving give reports. Olivia and Robert can't give afternoon reports. George can only give a report on Tuesday.  Therefore, we need to arrange the reports based on these conditions.
full_output:
<think>Nina giving a report will make Helen and Irving give reports. Olivia and Robert can't give afternoon reports. George can only give a report on Tuesday.  Therefore, we need to arrange the reports based on these conditions.</think>
<ans>B</ans>
